short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replace the Terrace House theme song on Netflix with "Slow Down" by Lights Follow.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Make your favorite slow-burn binge-worthy Japanese reality TV show even better with Slow Down x Terrace House! Replace the Terrace House theme song on Netflix with the best version ever, "Slow Down" by Lights Follow. This extension works with the most recent release of Opening New Doors in the US.
